name: Diesel Challenge 2K20
description: Finally a new release to the diesel sled pulling and diesel drag racing game that you have been waiting for. Featuring custom truck modifications like wheels, and mufflers. Modifying  your truck is effortless and the possibilities are endless.  Now with a chassis dyno to see your trucks performance gains.  HP modifications to visual modifications such as switching out to different wheels and adjusting your truck height. Also offering it’s very own online community for gamer's to share stats as well as posting to Facebook and Twitter.
